songs.title: Unapologetic Bitch (Live)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
When we did it, I'll admit it, wasn't satisfied
When the gun was loaded, you were never on my side
We only hurt the ones we love.

[Verse 1]
Woke up this morning feeling good that you were gone
Hurt for a while but I'm finally moving on
Said it, did it, hit it, quit it, then you let it go
See you trying to call me but I blocked you on my phone
It took a minute but right now I'm feeling strong
It almost killed me but I'm better off alone
Now you're saying that you're sorry, I don't wanna know
Better face the fact, you had to go

[Chorus]
It might sound like I'm an unapologetic bitch
But sometimes you know I gotta call it like it is
It might sound like I'm an unapologetic bitch
But sometimes you know I gotta call it like it is

[Post-Chorus]
You know, you never really knew
How much you loved me till you lost me, did you?
You know, you never really knew
How much your selfish bullshit cost me
Well, fuck you
It might sound like I'm an
It might sound like I'm an

[Verse 2]
I know you'd like it if I sat at home and cried
But that ain't gonna happen, here's the reason why
When we did it, I'll admit it, wasn't satisfied
When the gun was loaded, you were never on my side
I'm popping bottles that you can't even afford
I'm throwing parties and you won't get in the door
Said it, get it, love it, hate it, I don't care no more
Tell me how it feels to be ignored

[Chorus]
It might sound like I'm an unapologetic bitch
But sometimes you know I gotta call it like it is
It might sound like I'm an unapologetic bitch
But sometimes you know I gotta call it like it is

[Post-Chorus]
You know, you never really knew
How much you loved me till you lost me, did you?
You know, you never really knew
How much your selfish bullshit cost me
Well, fuck you
It might sound like I'm an
I need a new bitch in my life!
Please, someone!
It might sound like I'm an
Anyone?

[Bridge]
Yeah, yeah, yeah, woah
Yeah, yeah, yeah, woah
Yeah, yeah, yeah, woah
Yeah, yeah, yeah, woah
It might sound like I'm an
You've been a bad bad bad bad bad girl
It might sound like I'm an
Hard ass, bad bad bad, bad bad bad

[Chorus]
It might sound like I'm an unapologetic bitch
Come on, baby
But sometimes you know I gotta call it like it is
It might sound like I'm an unapologetic bitch
But sometimes you know I gotta call it like it is

[Post-Chorus]
You know, you never really knew
How much you loved me till you lost me, did you?
You know, you never really knew
How much your selfish bullshit cost me
Well, fuck you
It might sound like I'm an
[?]
It might sound like I'm an

It might sound like I'm an unapologetic bitch
But sometimes you know I gotta call it like it is
It might sound like (Fuck you!) I'm an unapologetic bitch
But sometimes you know I gotta call it like it is
Come on, baby
It might sound like I'm an
Drop it, drop it, drop it like it's hot, oh yeah
It might sound like I'm an

Yes! Oh yeah, oh yeah!
Yes! Yes bitch!
Do it like you mean it.

Rita Ora: Make some noise for the queen of the world!
Ladies and gentlemen, a big round of applause for tonight's unapologetic bitch
Give me a hug
Oh yeah
Te a'mo
You have a lot of clothes on
You have anything to apologize for?
Fuck no!
That's right!
God bless you.
Fuck yeah!
Oh wait, where you're going?
I don't think I spanked you hard enough
Katy Perry: I love you mom, I'm such a big fan!
Uhhhhhhh
It's a banana
Have you ever seen anything this big before?
Amy, you know what to do with it, right?
How many things you could do with a banana?
I chopped them up.
Have you licked them?
I have licked them.
Do not [?] with this banana.
Swallow it.
Yes!
A banana can save your life.
You wanna share it with me?
Bye guys
Have you ever seen anything this shape before?
Sucked them?
Sucked them.
Have you f-?
No.
No.
Okay, good, so that's something [?] for you to do.
Start right now baby
Who wants to wait for Andres's banana? Raise your hand.
Oh my god.
A diamond [?] banana
Ow ow you hurt me
Yeah!
Katy Perry: See you Friday!
Oh shit!
Hello!
Oh my god!
Bye bye my bitches.
